name: Scrofin
description: The Scrofin is a Medium fey creature characterized by its powerful physique, often seen engaging in grappling contests. It has a strong build accentuated by its muscular limbs, featuring bludgeoning fists and a dangerous gore attack.
memorable: Its ability to grapple larger opponents and endure lethal damage makes the Scrofin a challenging foe to overcome.
goals: To engage in challenges, tests of strength, and grappling contests.
relations: Generally interacts with other fey creatures and may be encountered with allies that share a curious or mischievous nature.
environment: Commonly found in fey realms, forests, or enchanted locations.
strengths: Excellent grappling ability and resilience through its Relentless trait.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Wisdom make it vulnerable to mental and magical challenges.
attacks: Uses powerful melee attacks with its fists and gore, capable of grappling and stunning foes.
most_powerful_ability: Quick to Anger, which enhances its combat effectiveness significantly when it is provoked.
skills: Proficient in athletics, reflecting its physical prowess.
additional_information: Can grapple larger creatures while moving at full speed.
Targets grappled by it suffer disadvantage on escape attempts.
Benefits from advantage on checks to escape grapples.
Can withstand lethal damage due to the Relentless ability.
test_queries: medium creature with strong grappling abilities
forested creature that can endure fatal blows
fey that enjoys challenges and contests
